Text:
As I stated, this is DVD2 of Altium Designer. The component library per default and documentation. Since this hasn't changed since release 10.0.0, its pointless to include in further 10.x.x updates. Waste of time and bandwidth.

Or, like some people try to do, don't compress, just STORE the "release" in a WinRAR archive. Emding up with an impressive release of 9GB where about 5GB actually is zeroes...

The current altium release has changed to a cloud based licensing system. Have no fear, we'll cope with it. But it takes some time to get things straight.

//Longword
